subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: Meb Keflezighi and Deena Kastor of the United States are considered among the top contenders to win the New York City Marathon. But they are not the favorites according to oddsmakers.
snippet: Meb Keflezighi and Deena Kastor of the United States are considered among the top contenders to win the New York City Marathon. But they are not the favorites according to oddsmakers.
